pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Bindings to the 'Quantuccia' Header-Only Essentials of 'QuantLib' // 'QuantLib' bindings are provided for R using 'Rcpp' and the header-only 'Quantuccia' variant (put together by Peter Caspers) offering an essential subset of 'QuantLib'. See the included file 'AUTHORS' for a full list of contributors to both 'QuantLib' and 'Quantuccia'.
